definition: a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Square, a strong trails floor emphasized this kind of feeling.
sentences.chinese: 广场一条强烈的步道铺地强调了这种感觉。

sentences.english: Church doors have been opened and you do not see the end of the Rose Trail.
sentences.chinese: 教堂门已开而你却不在一种植物的花步道看不到末端。

sentences.english: The rebuilt path to the office is made of used sleepers and ballast.
sentences.chinese: 通往事务所的枕木步道整理得焕然一新。

sentences.english: Pedestrians would meander through underground stores and moving streets between elevated highways.
sentences.chinese: 行人将通过地下商场区及移动步道来往于高架路之间。

sentences.english: The second generation of greenway is characterized by trail-oriented and non-motorized travel.
sentences.chinese: 第二代绿道以步道和非机动车通行为特点。

sentences.english: Take breaks and camp away from trails and other visitors.
sentences.chinese: 憩息或安营时远离步道与其他游人。

sentences.english: It was on the road and on the trail that my relationship with God became personal.
sentences.chinese: 正是在道路和步道上，我与上帝的关系成为个人。

sentences.english: In fact, the coastal walk Tsim Sha Tsui promenade, the harbour on the side.
sentences.chinese: 其实，漫步尖沙咀的滨海散步道，维港就在身旁。

sentences.english: Sunrise lights the inner canyon on the Kaibab Trail.
sentences.chinese: 日出步道灯的凯巴布峡谷内的。

sentences.english: Visitors and locals alike meander along the sidewalks of the Seine River.
sentences.chinese: 观光客和本地人都会沿着塞纳河的河滨步道漫步。

sentences.english: Completing the mountain trails project of "Cultivating Cave" with 999 steps in general.
sentences.chinese: 完成了“修真古洞”登山步道工程，总台阶999梯。

sentences.english: Work started this week on a project to reconstruct the park's South Kaibab Trail.
sentences.chinese: 本周，大峡谷南凯坝步道的重建工程开始动工。

sentences.english: These walking paths are called trails.

sentences.chinese: 森林步道，十六，克罗地亚。

sentences.english: It's a very nice park with lots of trees and walking paths.
sentences.chinese: 那是很好的公园有很多树和步道。

sentences.english: Ve near the start of the Presdental Tral.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于近一开始的总统步道。

definition: plank walkway constructed on the face of a cliff/(archaic) elevated passageway connecting the upper levels of adjacent towers
promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]
a low stone wall built along the water's edge to protect an embankment/revetment
see 林陰大道|林阴大道[lin2 yin1 da4 dao4]
